关于第13点，申请是真的吧？ 印象里当时很多媒体都报了。不过是25亿
https://www.reuters.com/article/us-china-health-usa-budget/trump-asking-congress-for-25-billion-to-fight-coronavirus-white-house-idUSKCN20J02T

还有第14点，“国防战争法”指的会不会是Defense Production Act？
https://www.reuters.com/article/us-china-health-usa-production-exclusive/exclusive-u-s-mulls-using-sweeping-powers-to-ramp-up-production-of-coronavirus-protective-gear-idUSKCN20L2S0
